xmp_property.name: originator
xmp_property.label: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_name/originator=Originator
xmp_property.description: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_description/originator=Name of the originator/producer of the audio file

xmp_property.name: originatorReference
xmp_property.label: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_name/originatorReference=Originator Reference
xmp_property.description: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_description/originatorReference=Non ambiguous reference allocated by the originating organization, see: EBU Recommendation R 99-1999 - Unique Source Identifier (USID) for use in the Originator Reference field of the Broadcast Wave Format

xmp_property.name: originationDate
xmp_property.label: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_name/originationDate=Origination Date
xmp_property.description: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_description/originationDate=Date of creation of the audio sequence. The format is yyyy-mm-dd (year-month-day)

xmp_property.name: originationTime
xmp_property.label: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_name/originationTime=Origination Time
xmp_property.description: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_description/originationTime=Time of creation of the audio sequence. The format is hh-mm-ss (hours-minutes-seconds)

xmp_property.name: timeReference
xmp_property.label: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_name/timeReference=Time Reference
xmp_property.description: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_description/timeReference=A count from midnight in samples to the first sample of the audio sequence

xmp_property.name: umid
xmp_property.label: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_name/umid=SMPTE UMID
xmp_property.description: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_description/umid=Unique Material Identifier, see: SMPTE 330M-2000: Television - Unique Material Identifier (UMID)

xmp_property.name: codingHistory
xmp_property.label: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_name/codingHistory=Coding History
xmp_property.description: $$$/custom_xmp_schemas/bext/property_description/codingHistory=Description of the coding process applied to the audio data, see: EBU R 98-1999: Format for CodingHistory field in Broadcast Wave Format files, BWF
